p: Since the outbreak of the novel SARS-like coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) in Wuhan, China, more than 4,000,000 cases have been reported globally. Recently, a large number of reports have been published to discuss the possible roles of environmental factors in transmission of the novel coronavirus. They have focused especially on the impact of two air parameters, temperature and humidity, on the spread of SARS-CoV-2.
